Class ec.plubar.SoulState 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.plubar.SoulState
public class SoulState
extends Object
implements Serializable, RtStateUpgradeable, RtDoNotEncode, ObjectInputValidation
Class to hold onto the state bundles of an unum.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Arturo Bejar

CREATE_METHOD_NAME
Method name used for CRAPI lookup for instantiation
MAX_BUNDLES
Maximum number of state bundles to keep hashtables small
myCapabilityGroup
Capability group for this unum
myInstantiateOnReadObject
Controls whether this unum is instantiated on decode or not
myStateBundles
Table for bundles indexed by class name string
myUnumClassName
Name of the class of unum to instantiate
myUnumKey
myUnumSoul
SOUL_PARAMETER
Parameter used for CRAPI lookup for instantiation

SoulState()
Construct a new soul state with no class and an initially empty bundle table.

get(String)
Return the state bundle associated with a particular class.
getCapability(String)
Get a capability from the unum's capability group.
getCapabilityGroup()
Return the soul's capability group.
instantiateOnReadObject(boolean)
Control whether the unum from this SoulState will be instantiated on readObject.
makeUnum()
Instantiate unum using state bundles.
put(istBase)
Add an element to the state bundle table.
put(String, istBase)
Add an element to the state bundle table based on role name.
readObject(ObjectInputStream)
Read method for Java serialization.
setCapabilityGroup(jEditableCapabilityGroup)
Set the soul's capability group.
setUnumKey(Object)
Store the UnumKey (just an Object) of the unum that this SoulState belongs to.
setUnumSoul(UnumSoul, Class)
Pair up a SoulState with an UnumSoul and class.
validateObject()
Validate the object by making the unum if appropriate.
writeObject(ObjectOutputStream)
Write method for Java serialization.

 private static final int MAX_BUNDLES
Maximum number of state bundles to keep hashtables small

Method name used for CRAPI lookup for instantiation

Parameter used for CRAPI lookup for instantiation

 private String myUnumClassName
Name of the class of unum to instantiate

 private Hashtable myStateBundles
Table for bundles indexed by class name string

Capability group for this unum

 private boolean myInstantiateOnReadObject
Controls whether this unum is instantiated on decode or not

myUnumSoul 
 private transient UnumSoul myUnumSoul
myUnumKey 
 private Object myUnumKey

SoulState 
 public SoulState()
Construct a new soul state with no class and an initially empty bundle table.

get 
 public istBase get(String bundleClassName)
Return the state bundle associated with a particular class.

Parameters:
bundleClassName - The name of the class of state bundle you want
Returns:
state bundle of that class or null if there isn't one.
getCapability 
 public EObject getCapability(String capabilityName)
Get a capability from the unum's capability group.

Parameters:
capabilityName - Name of Java type of capability to look up.
Returns:
Capability of the given type, or null if the group doesn't contain a capability of that type.
getCapabilityGroup 
 public jEditableCapabilityGroup getCapabilityGroup()
Return the soul's capability group.

instantiateOnReadObject 
 public void instantiateOnReadObject(boolean value)
Control whether the unum from this SoulState will be instantiated on readObject.

Parameters:
value - Setting for the instantiate-on-read-object flag
makeUnum 
 private void makeUnum()
Instantiate unum using state bundles.

put 
 public void put(istBase stateBundle)
Add an element to the state bundle table.

Parameters:
stateBundle - A state bundle object to add to the table Since the table is indexed by class name, you can only put one of each class of state bundle into the SoulState.
put 
 public void put(String ingredientRole,
                 istBase stateBundle)
Add an element to the state bundle table based on role name.

Parameters:
stateBundle - A state bundle object to add to the table Since the table is indexed by class name, you can only put one of each class of state bundle into the SoulState.
readObject 
 private void readObject(ObjectInputStream in) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
Read method for Java serialization. Reads in the unum's name and state bundles. Registers validation for unum instantiation.

Throws: IOException
from readObject() or readBoolean()
Throws: ClassNotFoundException
from readObject() or readBoolean()
setCapabilityGroup 
 public void setCapabilityGroup(jEditableCapabilityGroup capabilityGroup)
Set the soul's capability group.

Parameters:
capabilityGroup - What to set it to
setUnumSoul 
 public void setUnumSoul(UnumSoul soul,
                         Class unumClass)
Pair up a SoulState with an UnumSoul and class.

Parameters:
soul - The UnumSoul to pair up with
unumClass - The class of the unum whose soul we are to be
setUnumKey 
 public void setUnumKey(Object unumKey)
Store the UnumKey (just an Object) of the unum that this SoulState belongs to.

Parameters:
unumKey - The unum's key.
validateObject 
 public void validateObject() throws InvalidObjectException
Validate the object by making the unum if appropriate. Part of the Java serialization interface. Called after all of the souls have been loaded, all the channels for capabilities have been set up now.

writeObject 
 private void writeObject(ObjectOutputStream out) throws IOException
Write method for Java serialization. Writes the unum's class name and the state bundle hashtable.
